name: Shallow Reef
description: Perfect for colorful coral formations in shallow water (0-30ft). Enhances warm tones and coral colors with moderate contrast.

name: Deep Blue
description: Ideal for deep water photography with blue backgrounds. Cool tone correction with enhanced shadows and clarity.

name: Cave Dive
description: Designed for low-light cave diving with artificial lighting. Dramatic contrast and warm color balance.

name: Murky Water
description: Specialized for low visibility conditions. Maximum clarity enhancement and backscatter reduction.

name: Tropical Clear
description: Perfect for crystal clear tropical waters. Vibrant saturation with balanced exposure and enhanced blues/greens.

name: Macro Marine Life
description: Optimized for close-up marine life photography. Enhanced detail and color pop for small subjects.

name: Wreck Photography
description: Tailored for shipwreck exploration. Balanced exposure with enhanced structural details and atmospheric lighting.

name: Night Dive
description: Specialized for night diving with artificial light sources. Handles extreme contrasts and color temperature variations.
